0.name: Fyrefly Type-IV: Complete Combustion
0.fullDesc:
Enters the Complete Combustion state, advances this unit's Action by 100%, and gains Enhanced Basic ATK and Enhanced Skill. While in Complete Combustion, increases SPD by {{3}}, and when using the Enhanced Basic ATK or Enhanced Skill, increases this unit's Weakness Break efficiency by {{2, percent}}% and the Break DMG dealt by SAM to the enemy targets by {{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%, lasting until this current attack ends.
A countdown timer for the Complete Combustion state appears on the Action Order. When the countdown timer's turn starts, SAM exits the Complete Combustion state. The countdown timer has a fixed SPD of {{4}}.
SAM cannot use Ultimate while in Complete Combustion.
0.shortDesc: Enters the Complete Combustion state. <orangeStrong>Advances this unit's Action by <unbreak>100%</orangeStrong></color>. Gains <orangeStrong>Enhanced Basic ATK</orangeStrong> and <orangeStrong>Enhanced Skill</orangeStrong>. Increases this unit's <orangeStrong>SPD, Weakness Break efficiency, and the Break DMG received by the enemy targets</orangeStrong>, lasting until the countdown ends.
